name: Ghost Ride
storyline: Blue gets in a mysterious castle of the Queen of Shadows. Trying to get out, he meets resistance from the Keepers of the castle and the servants of the Queen.  Gathering all his strength, Blue, flying faster and faster... Will he escape from mystical prison?
summary:
Great relaxing arcade game with incredible art. 

Nice ghost Blue adventure in a mysterious world. Without in-game purchases.
